1552871704_1NZftAz9VSawGF5JgMYGFv4ByoKEa.body:
Human invented knife to cut things.
human invented wheel for transportation
human make use of (and reproduce) fire to cook, burn thing
human invented light bulb
human invented telephone
human built calculator to help calculation
human built computer to solve complicated jobs

Can an AI robot/program/software do these thing from scratch? 

AI, like many tools created/invented by human, such as mower, bus, airplane, ship, to assist human.
